pull.title: test: Do not swallow flake8 exit code
pull.body:
After #18210 the `flake8` exit code in `test/lint/lint-python.sh` just not used that makes the linter broken.

This PR:
- combines exit codes of `flake8` and `mypy` into the  `test/lint/lint-python.sh` exit code
- documents `mypy` as the test dependency

events.body:
Oh, very nice catch! Thanks for fixing.

ACK eff770fcd299fb79f6cee93bf21f926f0f9f8251 -- patch looks correct

events.body:
Updated eff770fcd299fb79f6cee93bf21f926f0f9f8251 -> 5d77549d8b287eb773db695b88c165ebe3be1005 ([pr19172.01](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr19172.01) -> [pr19172.02](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr19172.02), [diff](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/compare/pr19172.01..pr19172.02)):

- addressed @MarcoFalke's [comment](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19172#discussion_r435887219):
> why remove this check?

comments.body: But why does travis not print this warning message?

comments.body:
False positive warnings due to the outdated local `flake8` version:
```
$ pip3 show flake8 | grep Version
Version: 3.5.0
```

Going to fix this pull now.
